View Javadoc

1   package org.kohsuke.args4j;
2   
3   import static org.junit.Assert.assertEquals;
4   
5   import java.util.List;
6   
7   import org.junit.Before;
8   import org.junit.Test;
9   
10  /**
11   * Some tests for the {@link ProxyOptionHandler}
12   * 
13   * @author Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
14   *
15   */
16  public class ProxyOptionsListTest {
17  	static class ObjectWithOptions {
18  		@Option(name = "-r", required = true)
19  		int required;
20  	}
21  	
22  	enum OptionsEnum implements CmdLineOptionsProvider {
23  		FIRST {
24  			@Override
25  			public Object getOptions() {
26  				return new ObjectWithOptions();
27  			}
28  		},
29  		SECOND {
30  			@Override
31  			public Object getOptions() {
32  				return new Object();
33  			}
34  		}
35  		;
36  	}
37  	
38  	class OptionsHolder {
39  		@Option(name = "-opt", required = false, handler = ProxyOptionHandler.class)
40  		List<OptionsEnum> opt;
41  		List<Object> optOp;
42  	}
43  	
44  	OptionsHolder options;
45  	CmdLineParser parser;
46  	
47  	/**
48  	 * Setup
49  	 */
50  	@Before
51  	public void setup() {
52  		options = new OptionsHolder();
53  		parser = new CmdLineParser(options);
54  	}
55  	
56  	/**
57  	 * No options 
58  	 * 
59  	 * @throws CmdLineException 
60  	 */
61  	@Test
62  	public void testHandler1() throws CmdLineException {
63  		parser.parseArgument();
64  	}
65  	
66  	/**
67  	 * One option (SECOND)
68  	 * 
69  	 * @throws CmdLineException 
70  	 */
71  	@Test
72  	public void testHandler2() throws CmdLineException {
73  		parser.parseArgument("-opt", "SECOND");
74  	}
75  	
76  	/**
77  	 * One option (FIRST); should fail because of missing required
78  	 * 
79  	 * @throws CmdLineException 
80  	 */
81  	@Test(expected = CmdLineException.class)
82  	public void testHandler3() throws CmdLineException {
83  		parser.parseArgument("-opt", "FIRST");
84  	}
85  	
86  	/**
87  	 * One option (FIRST) with required
88  	 * 
89  	 * @throws CmdLineException 
90  	 */
91  	@Test
92  	public void testHandler4() throws CmdLineException {
93  		parser.parseArgument("-opt", "FIRST", "-r", "1");
94  		assertEquals(1, options.optOp.size());
95  		assertEquals(1, ((ObjectWithOptions)options.optOp.get(0)).required);
96  	}
97  	
98  	/**
99  	 * Two options: (SECOND), (FIRST with required)
100 	 * 
101 	 * @throws CmdLineException 
102 	 */
103 	@Test
104 	public void testHandler5() throws CmdLineException {
105 		parser.parseArgument("-opt", "SECOND", "-opt", "FIRST", "-r", "1");
106 		assertEquals(2, options.optOp.size());
107 		assertEquals(1, ((ObjectWithOptions)options.optOp.get(1)).required);
108 	}
109 	
110 	/**
111 	 * Two options: (FIRST with required), (SECOND)
112 	 * 
113 	 * @throws CmdLineException 
114 	 */
115 	@Test
116 	public void testHandler6() throws CmdLineException {
117 		parser.parseArgument("-opt", "FIRST", "-r", "1", "-opt", "SECOND");
118 		assertEquals(2, options.optOp.size());
119 		assertEquals(1, ((ObjectWithOptions)options.optOp.get(0)).required);
120 	}
121 	
122 	/**
123 	 * Two options: (FIRST without required), (SECOND). Should throw because of missing required.
124 	 * 
125 	 * @throws CmdLineException 
126 	 */
127 	@Test(expected = CmdLineException.class)
128 	public void testHandler7() throws CmdLineException {
129 		parser.parseArgument("-opt", "FIRST", "-opt", "SECOND");
130 		System.out.println(options.optOp);
131 	}
132 	
133 	/**
134 	 * Two options: (SECOND), (FIRST without required). Should throw because of missing required.
135 	 * 
136 	 * @throws CmdLineException 
137 	 */
138 	@Test(expected = CmdLineException.class)
139 	public void testHandler8() throws CmdLineException {
140 		parser.parseArgument("-opt", "SECOND", "-opt", "FIRST");
141 	}
142 }
